content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, 1 to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator 6, and denominator open parenthesis, x plus 3, close parenthesis, raised to the three halves power, end fraction, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></msubsup><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></math> is

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
